setting.name: Zone Name 1
setting.description: The name of the temp humidity space

setting.name: Use Fahrenheit units
setting.description: Use Fahrenheit temp measurements, otherwise Celsius units are used

setting.name: Temperature Sysvar
setting.description: Temperature variable used for calculation

setting.name: Temperature Divisor
setting.description: Temperature divisor used for calculation

setting.name: Humidity Sysvar
setting.description: Humidity variable used for calculation

setting.name: Inlet Zone Name
setting.description: The name of the inlet zone to control a baffle

setting.name: Inlet Baffle Delta
setting.description: Dewpoint temperature differential to open baffle

setting.name: Open Baffle Macro
setting.description: Macro to call when the dewpoint on the inlet zone is less than the current zone

setting.name: Close Baffle Macro
setting.description: Macro to call when the dewpoint on the inlet zone is more than the current zone
